title: The Tabata App
description: A simple Tabata application compatible on IOS and Android. My React Native project
retex: This project is the first application I coded in React Native. Thanks to him, I was able to learn the basics of React Native and React as well as how IOS Simulator works. I was able to apply my knowledge in ES6 and learn the main elements of react like Hooks.
delivered: The app is a tabata. It has a countdown, two duration selectors, one for exercise time and one for rest time. It also has a button to go to the countdown page, a start button, a pause button and a reset button. Finally, it has a settings page

title: Lowatem AI
description: Project for the IUT. Board game with two opposing players and AI development
retex: This project allowed me to acquire solid bases in object-oriented programming in Java. I was able to learn to use mostly Classes, Enums and arrays. I learned how some AI algorithms work, in this case the MiniMax algorithm
delivered: Lowatem is a board game where two players fight using pawns (soldiers) and different weapons. When one of the two days has eliminated all the soldiers of the opposing players, he wins. The AI that I coded makes it possible to beat an opposing player at least 8 times out of 10.

title: Pong
description: First project for the IUT. Development of the classic pong game with objects, collision, balls and sprites management.
retex: This project allowed me to start Java and learn the basic concepts and algorithms
delivered: Reproduction of the classic Pong game using the processing tool and Java. We had to implement the game window, the balls and their movements, the rackets and their movements, obstacles, score management and the possibility of playing with 2 or 4 players

title: Clajem
description: Project for the IUT. Creation of an electric skateboard rental and sale business. Realization of the PESTEL analysis and its website. Team project
retex: This project allowed me to work in a team and manage the sharing of tasks in a group project
delivered: Creation of a company selling and renting electric skateboards. With my team, we had to carry out the provisional budget, the PESTEL analysis and the description of this company. We then had to create the website to promote our product.

title: Storyboard
description: Project for the IUT. Creation of an electric skateboard rental and sale business. Realization of the PESTEL analysis and its website. Team project
retex: Thanks to this project, I was able to learn the basics of Bash and I was able to practice creating more or less complex algorithms
delivered: It was necessary to create a Bash script allowing to generate HTML pages containing parts of a PDF file converted into PNG and extracts of an audio file

title: Wine Orders
description: Project for the IUT. Creation and conception of database to manage wine orders. Team project

title: Card Game
description: Game of 6 qui prend, with graphical interface windows form
